title: nitehawk shorts animation showcase
description: Animation showcase at Nitehawk Prospect Park. $15 admission.

title: the 99th feast of san gennaro
description: Annual feast in Little Italy featuring food, vendors, and live music. Free admission (pay-as-you-go).

title: printed matter’s ny art book fair
description: Annual art book fair at MoMA PS1 featuring over 250 exhibitors. $40 Thursday opening night, $8 Friday-Saturday, free admission Sunday.
cost: $40 thurs opening night, $8 fri-sat, free admission sun

title: commemorating 9/11
description: Tribute in Light installation and Table of Silence Project performance at Lincoln Center’s Josie Robertson Plaza. Free admission.

title: dapperq lgbtqia+ fashion show
description: Annual LGBTQIA+ fashion show at Brooklyn Museum. $20 admission.

title: gen z vs millennials gameshow
description: Comedy gameshow at C’mon Everybody. $13.39, proceeds benefit the Transgender Law Center.

title: peer revue
description: Ted talks with comedians at Caveat, featuring real experts and real talks. $13.61 with promo code 'skintrevue'.

title: fantastic fiction at kgb
description: Monthly speculative-fiction reading series at KGB Bar featuring Fran Wilde and Shiva Kumar. Free admission.

title: mortified
description: Storytelling show where adults share embarrassing childhood artifacts at Littlefield. $12 advance, $15 day of.

title: written in brooklyn storytelling series presents: ‘maybe not the best idea’ edition
description: Storytelling event at Farm.One in Prospect Heights. $17.85 with promo code 'skint'.

title: my kinda night! a queer variety show
description: Variety show featuring drag, cabaret, and comedy at Medusa Bar Brooklyn. Free admission.

title: handle with care: robert rauschenberg’s ecological conscience
description: Exhibition at NYU’s Grey Art Museum featuring Robert Rauschenberg’s ecological conscience, running through 4/11/2026. Suggested donation of $5 for non-NYU students, faculty, and staff.

title: station paused for forecasting: unstable landscapes
description: Exhibition featuring a new generation of artists from the Academy of Arts, Architecture, and Design in Prague, running through 12/31.

title: dress, dreams, and desire: fashion and psychoanalysis
description: Exhibition at The Museum at FIT exploring the intersection of fashion and psychoanalysis, running through 1/4/2026. Free admission.

title: camouflage by ai weiwei
description: Exhibition by Ai Weiwei at FDR Four Freedoms State Park, running through 11/10. Free admission.
address: FDR Four Freedoms State Park, Roosevelt Island

title: gaza biennale new york pavilion
description: Exhibition at Recess Art featuring the Gaza Biennale, running through 1/24/2026. Free admission.

title: beetles, cats, clouds: the manga of tsurita kuniko, yamada murasaki, and kondoh akino
description: Exhibition at 80WSE NYU Gallery showcasing manga artists, running through 1/24/2026. Free admission.

title: salt water remembers: textile arts center 16th artists-in-residence exhibition
description: Exhibition at Textile Arts Center showcasing artists-in-residence, running through 9/24. Free admission.

title: alt citizen 15 year anniversary show series
description: Concert series celebrating 15 years of Alt Citizen with multiple acts across various venues in NYC. $15 advance, $20 at the door.
address: Multiple venues in Manhattan, Brooklyn, and Queens

title: our findings show! the science gameshow
description: Science gameshow hosted by Tom Lum at Caveat, featuring trials inspired by real scientific papers. $13.61 with promo code 'skint'.

title: i <3 the 90's cover band night
description: Cover band night featuring 90's hits at TV Eye, with prizes for best 90's gear. $12 admission.

title: dan fest ’25 – ‘a night of perfect, free films’
description: Film screening and Q&A with Dan Perlman at Anthology Archives. Free admission.

title: free outdoor movie: sideways
description: Outdoor movie screening at the Rooftop at Pier 17. Free admission.
